instruction: Describe the approach used by a startup to scale up from zero to one million customers within two years.
output: The startup employed robust marketing strategies such as investing in organic SEO and aggressive social media campaigns to reach a wide customer base online. They also implemented effective customer retention strategies, offering discounts to loyal customers, and providing excellent customer service. They allocated additional resources to growth-oriented activities such as creating viral content, engaging influencers and offering discounts to new customers. Furthermore, they focused on improving the customer experience through things such as fast delivery, reliable customer service, upgrading product features, and using customer feedback to inform future product iterations.
